SELECT * FROM ( SELECT i.id, i.title, i.price, i.created_at, NVL(ord_cnt.order_count, 0) AS purchaseCount, ( SELECT ii.filename FROM item_images ii WHERE ii.item_id = i.id AND ii.sort_order = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS filename, u.nickname AS sellerName FROM items i JOIN users u ON i.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT item_id, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM orders WHERE order_status != '취소' GROUP BY item_id ) ord_cnt ON i.id = ord_cnt.item_id ORDER BY i.created_at DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 4
